snippet: Andy Reid was introduced as the new coach of the Kansas City Chiefs on Monday, one week after he was fired following 14 mostly successful seasons in Philadelphia.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets opt not to retain quarterbacks coach Matt Cavanaugh, likely first step of coaching staff overhaul; other football developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Andy Reid was introduced as the new coach of the Kansas City Chiefs on Monday, one week after he was fired following 14 mostly successful seasons in Philadelphia.

headline.main: Jets Won’t Bring Back Quarterbacks Coach
headline.print_headline: Jets Won’t Bring Back Quarterbacks Coach
